buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

getUserCap(address).details: Returns the cap of a specific user.

params._beneficiary: Address whose cap is to be checked

getUserContribution(address).details: Returns the amount contributed so far by a sepecific user.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setGroupCap(address[],uint256).details: Sets a group of users' maximum contribution.

params._beneficiaries: List of addresses to be capped

setUserCap(address,uint256).details: Sets a specific user's maximum contribution.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
